column4: I've installed java on my system, but how do I make sure that PATH includes the path to java always?
i used the jdk install from the Sun java site
the wiki should mention how to set the $PATH for it
i'll check, but I've seen a few places on the web like 'export PATH=$PATH:/path/to/java/bin:.'

then i dont know what to advise
run chkdsk in windows on the partition
in Windows, there is a utility to fix your windows file system. it's called chkdsk

if your partition is screwed, qtparted won't work on it
